roleset.name: act of doing away with something

role.descr: thing that's abolished, gotten rid of

roleset.note: Roleset based on expansion parallel to WordNet eventive nouns. Framed by Claire. Corresponds to VerbNet class Remove-10.1, based on verb entry abolish.01.

example.name: Arg1, "0f-phrase"
example.text: They first insisted that the abolition of the slave-trade would ruin the colonies.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: It mentions the British celebrated their abolition of slave trade last year.
